alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mecklenburg and central Lunenburg Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Keysville to near Redoak to Scottsburg. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chase City, Victoria, Kenbridge, Lunenburg, Clarksville, Boydton, Kells Corner, Buffalo Springs, Rehoboth, Wilburn, Spanish Grove, Finchley, Finneywood, Fairview, Plantersville, Rogers Corner, Blevins Corner, Pleasant Grove, Oral Oaks and John H Kerr Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
